info.name: Rose Tint! Google Docs
info.description: Rose Tint! Google Docs While I love the Pinkify theme, sometimes I need something more calm to actually focus. So here is the new Rose Tint theme! INSTALLATION AND CUSTOMISATION INSTRUCTIONS Important! This theme is not very accessible! The contrast ratio is not suitable for those with sight problems. If there is demand, I might make a version that has better contrast rations while still looking cute. Support me on tumblr!
